name: closefriend
text: Hammer Time gets old when you're almost fifty. But it is still in fact Hammer Time, and Todd is simply 2 Legit 2 Quit.

name: relaxing
text: Do you still remember how to do the "2 Legit 2 Quit" hand motions because I do.

name: tekende
text: This should be the alt text.

name: jaldor
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: dusty
text: At times I ponder how good you are at commenting.

name: relaxing
text: Pfft, hardly. My lame/chubby ratio is far outstripped by your own. 0.1094 vs 0.0171 -- I'm an order of magnitude more lame.

name: wehavemagnums
text: I love how Todd's curled up against the inside of the KFC bucket in p4.

name: petitegitan
text: I had to look at it twice to get what it was.  It's like one of those things where you might see a face, or a vase.

name: saurkraus
text: Aww, he's all cute and vulnerable.

name: stuart
text: Yeah, when you think Todd you think "cute and vulnerable".

name: spinynorman
text:
little ribbon of vomit all trickling out of his mouth

dubious odor sneakin out of his Southern Bits

name: saint
text: when I think Todd, I think shanks and frikkin sweet.

name: achilleselbow
text: I think "cunt pills" and "gunny sack".

name: carlyle
text: I think "prison baby" and "doesn't give a shit"

name: fuzzyshoo
text: a dumb broad with a big veiny rack

name: lexsenthur
text: This is basically how I see Todd never .

name: ferdinand
text: or a kfc bucket full of road tar.

name: cailetshadow
text: I see it, I see it! It's a goat's head!

name: heccibiggs
text: Oh, I see the goat's head!

name: scorpio_nadir
text: It's a stylized glyphic of Emperor Neckbeard. Laughing!

name: usversusthem
text: It's a stylized glyphic of Emperor Goatbeard, laughing, with his throat slit.

name: machegav
text: I've decided that it would either be a) a curled-up squirrel, post-vomit, or b) a piece of coral wielding a knife and yelling threateningly.

name: domdacey
text: It looks like a goat with a birthmark the first time I read it.

name: helenabuckett
text: I had to look like a dozen times before I even figured out what panel four was, and even then it's like some radial Rorshach test - I see disturbing things. And a squirrel.

name: ketelcat
text: Haha! I only just noticed what that was. I thought it was a weird round map on the dash, like some GPS thing or something. I feel really really silly.

name: mega_panda
text: I saw a running washing machine

name: geysershitdick
text: I wonder if he stopped the car before throwing him out.

name: tekende
text: Would you?

name: centipede_damascus
text: Mayor C is fifty, and he just does not have the patience for Hammer Time.

name: achilleselbow
text: Is Mayor C. Ray's nickname for Cornelius? Or is it just a random old guy?

name: cpnglxynchos
text: it is definitely a nick for Connie.

name: sirfrederick
text: Mayor C. Finnigan Byde! Cornelius is surely older than 50.

name: tombsgrave
text: Todd looks like a stain.  This is appropriate.

name: woodenteeth
text: orrrhhh man, KFC at a Rehab joint, someone might just scoff him before they realise he's a half dead squirrel...

name: abe
text: I wish Ray was my Dad.

name: cthulhu235
text: Damn, that's wicked disturbing, Todd all curled up in a KFC bucket. It's like looking at a roadkill cat, that's how upsetting it is.

name: gormster
text: Nowhere near as disturbing as your avatar.

name: cthulhu235
text: Hell, dude, that's just me wounded in Afghanistan. It's not like I just googled a nasty bloody eyebrow.

name: splendorr
text: But somehow, it's like that's what you did do.

name: jackparsons
text: The picture of Colonel Lingus is out of date.  He has now been given a metrosexual gaydar haircut. Weird.

name: spicyponyhead
text: Chubbied, just in case you were referencing the "Colonel Angus" skit on SNL.

name: obvious
text: Note that according to the blogs, Ray has a cast on his foot at this point. So the fact that he cold throws Todd out the window is almost understandable. Sort of.

name: tekende
text: Even if he wasn't wearing a cast, it would still be pretty understandable. I mean, Todd is a crappy little bullshit man.

name: choosebro
text: Hey most men would have just stopped giving the guy money for blow. Not helping out a friend is not an option for Ray; either he gives Todd money for the drug or he pays for our Squirrel friend's rehab.

name: jezebel
text: Especially considering the fact that they don't have curbside wheelchair pick-up service at discount rehab.

name: mountaindewtab
text: thats how i would drop ANYBODY off at a rehab clinic. my own (unborn as of yet) children included

name: buttermoths
text: Todd looks like a Roseanne in a bucket.

name: chuchurocket
text: i never want to encounter the bucket in which rosanne would fit.

name: buttermoths
text:
No no. Not THE Roseanne; A Roseanne.
http://achewood.com/index.php?date=07052006 (I do not dare to even attempt BB Code)
Last panel.

name: buttermoths
text: ...though there IS probably a photoshopped (or is it?)image out there somewhere of a naked Roseanne in a bucket, with the caption "I HAZ A BUKKIT", for those who dare to look.

name: heccibiggs
text: Why, are you afraid of really big buckets or something?

name: xiaomimi
text:
Weekend Blogs

Roast Beef: Had to give knife back
Lyle: piss's lookiong better

name: corpsey
text: I'm 21 and I can only handle 3-4 Hammer Times an hour, tops. I dread to think how hard it would be for a 50 year old bear.

name: drago25
text: Travelling to rehab on the Colonel Express only way to go

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Will that be Original Rehab or Extra Crispy?

name: cracker
text: I've read this one over a few times and looked at Ray's blog for  August 2005 and I haven't figured out who Ray is talking to. Am I missing something or is it meant to be a Mystery?

name: direhaggis
text: That is a stone cold and utterly appropriate rehab experience. Why can't the Britney Spears and Lindsay Lohans of the world be shoved into giant Kentucky Fried Chicken buckets and thrown out of SUV's?

name: pogo
text: This is the kind of rehad drop-off Britney should get next time.

name: pogo
text: And "rehab," too!

name: tripperday
text:
Know what I need?

KFC buckets containing drugged up squirrels.

name: tekende
text: I heard some lady got one in her bucket a KFC a few years ago. She sued over it and got like a million dollars.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
She and Todd split the simoleons, 90/10. ( Todd's not too good with math)
It was a good grift.

name: spicyponyhead
text: This is the saddest thing.

name: roastbeefd
text: It looks like Rolf Harris on the KFC bucket.
